Chaojie's Blog starry night

About

I'm a sophomore at Stony Brook University, major in Computer Engineering. I started programming two years ago after I took an online introduction course to computer programming. Ironically, the main reason why I took that class was to learn about English. But after I took that class, I was drawn to computer programming. I started to learn more about it, and later I decided to purue it as my career.
I have wide range of interests - electronics, computer hardware, and computer programming. I love my major, becuase I can learn and then create real stuff that benefits other peoeple. Everytime when I finish a project, I feel fulfill and proud. That's what keep me continue learn more and get better.
Right now, the topic I'm most interested in is data-related subject. These days everyone talks about buzzwords like big data, data-mining and so on without actually knowing what are they. I want to take a journey to uncover what are they and how to utilize them. In an era where data grows exponentially, I think it's crucial to be able to understand data and make best use of it. I have a strong background in programming, but I don't know to analyze data, which is one thing I'm currently working to improve on.
If you have an internship position for summer or spring break, please contact me. You can refer to my resume for more informtion about me.
